title: I grAmadali
sahitya:
I grAmadali vAsa iruvade prayAsa


caraNam 1    honnu haNagaLu illa iruvudake sthaLavilla tannavaru tanage embuvaru illa 
bennu tokkambadake matte sOdararilla innilli ihavilla paravillavalla
    caraNam 2    duDuki keDukanigUru oDavevuLLavagUru oDalAsege tirugi timbuvage Uru
biDade para vastugaLu apaharisuvavagUru kaDu pApi kapaTiyAdavarigI Uru
    caraNam 3    enna manadubbasava Arigusiralo dEva cenna kEshava ninna caraNavannu 
innu nambidenayya purandara viTTala binnapava nI kELi enna salahayya
